participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Reflective and adventurous, Emily enjoys exploring nature and finds peace in the outdoors. She is going through a period of change after her recent breakup.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is orange. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i have a pet fish.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, Larry has a passion for cooking and a love for the great outdoors. He enjoys sharing his culinary skills with others.
participant_2.background: i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. l also love comic books. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water.
